block_comment: This block of Verilog code is used to detect a falling edge in a digital waveform. It accomplishes this by using the 'assign' keyword to assign the "falling_edge" signal a value based on a logical AND operation between two other signals: "found_edge" and "last_test_clk". The "falling_edge" signal will go high (true) only if both the "found_edge" and "last_test_clk" signals are high, which indicates a falling edge has been found.
